This call is to a method from API 26, the call containing class androidx.navigation.testapp.AndroidFragment is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 26. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(26) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(26).
